name: Delirious
description:
This game has 3 different levels with unique atmospheres and puzzles/challenges.

Please play in Full Screen for the best experience! (Click twice in the bottom right corner)

Controls: WASD + Mouse to move,  Space to jump, Shift to sprint, LMB to interact and esc to open up the level menu.

Made in early 2017 (Senior year HS Project)- unedited version of that project! Simply being released now.

Thank you for playing!
